name: My First Coop
description:
Intro

This is a simple game I made to play with my 3 year old kid.

How to play
  • The game will (I hope) detect connected gamepads to your PC (up to 4 players).
  • Keyboard: Arrow keys and WASD keys.
  • Collect all coins and the key for the locked door will appear.
  • Step on buttons to open the colored gates.
Third-party assets
  • Jammo Character by Mix and Jam
  • Boximon Fiery Mega Toon Series & Chicken Mega Toon Series by Meshtint Studio
  • POLYGON Prototype Pack by Synty Studio
  • Music Puzzle Pieces by Abstraction
